markdownRemark.html: <i></i>   <i></i>   <i></i> -9<p>Nowadays a long-term relationship is not enjoyed by many people and where ever we pit are eyes, we see people getting divorced and separating from each other. It seems like marriage is a difficult task, maybe. However, here are some extremely attractive and lovable couple which are proving that love life is not that difficult to manage as it seems to many! Sighs.</p> <p>What a news! Isn‚Äôt it? They teach us that dedication, commitment and hard work always pays off in this regard. Love is not something you get easily, it indeed requires patience and hard work, but sooner or later one does experience a beautiful, loving and lasting relationship.</p> <h2>Isla Fisher and Sacha Baron Cohen</h2>      <p> About last night üçã@sabrinabmakeup @cwoodhair #alexperrydress #swaroskipurse @stuartweitzman</p> <p>A post shared by Isla Fisher (@islafisher) on Feb 27, 2017 at 2:59pm PST</p>   <p></p> <p>Isla Fisher is a famous actor from the incredible movie called Confessions of a Shopaholic. Since the past seven years, she has tied the knot with the actor famous for his comedy called Sacha Baron Cohen. They initially met each other in 2002. They have been living a happy life with their three wonderful children. Fisher narrated an extremely funny incident that took place when her parents visited Sacha on a set during a project was going on. Fisher narrated the amusing incident as she told that her parents eagerly wanted to meet Sacha and travelled to Cape Town for this purpose. As Fisher, along with her parents went on the stage, they could not find her husband anywhere near. However, after a short while, from one of the two elephants love boxes, which were being used for the shooting purpose, Sacha‚Äôs head popped out and he continued acting as a fighter, which made them realize that shooting was being carried out as the film crew was standing there as well. Fisher considered this event extremely hilarious and enjoyed telling this in an interview.</p> <h2>Matt Damon and Luciana Barroso</h2>      <p> Si 'Manchester by the Sea' ganara "Best Picture" en los #Oscars 2017 El productor #MattDamon ganar√≠a su segundo Oscar esta noche. ¬°Suerte! Aqu√≠ lo vemos acompa√±ado de su hermosa esposa #LucianaBarroso</p> <p>A post shared by TVyNovelas USA (@tvynovelas_usa) on Feb 26, 2017 at 4:19pm PST</p>   <p></p> <p>This couple is together since a very long time and is considered extremely charming by many people out there. We are talking about no one but Matt Damon and Luciana Barroso who are indeed Hollywood‚Äôs most noticeable and amiable couple. The couple is still in love with each other like the way they were when they first met each other long ago. Damon narrated the event when he first saw her in Miami, as he was there for the shooting of their film, ‚ÄòStuck on you‚Äô. He told this story on The Ellen DeGeneres Show back in 2011, as he said that while he was hanging out with his film crew and friends in Miami on a special night, he saw her in a room full of people and that was when he immediately fell in love with her. He knew instantly that she was the one. While narrating, he said that it has been a good eight years and we have four children which concludes our life peacefully and with a lot of love. He also added that he is grateful to life for making thing happen that way or lese she would not have been with him today.</p> <h2>Sarah Michelle Gellar and Freddie Prinze</h2>      <p> Since it would take too long, to thank everyone for their kind words on our anniversary- THANK YOU (EVERYONE) #happyanniversary</p> <p>A post shared by Sarah Michelle (@sarahmgellar) on Sep 2, 2017 at 7:59am PDT</p>   <p></p> <p>Another most attractive and very charming couple is of Sarah Michelle Gellar and Freddie Prinze Jr. who look so perfect with each other, every single time we spot them together! They initially met each other as they worked together in the shooting of a scary movie called I Know What You Did Last Summer of 1997. Sarah narrated the way they had their first date by saying that they previously had planned to have dinner taking a friend along, however that friend could not possibly come, so they planned to enjoy dinner anyway. That is how they got together, forever! The marriage proved to be a success and today they have a beautiful daughter who is named Charlotte and a son who is four years old and named Rocky. Both of them freely shared their secrets of keeping a relationship in the long-term and did not feel uncomfortable at all. Freddie is also reported to have said that it is crucial that the couple successfully makes each other laugh so that happiness stays for a lifetime to come.</p> <h2>David Beckham and Victoria</h2>      <p> Wow 17 years ago to this day this happened‚Ä¶ I was lucky to meet someone who has the same drive and wanted the same things in life‚Ä¶ We have created 4 beautiful children and I couldn't wish for a more loving and caring mummy for them‚Ä¶ Happy anniversary, I love you ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è</p> <p>A post shared by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Jul 4, 2016 at 1:05am PDT</p>   <p></p> <p>On 4th July, 1999 at Luttrellstown Castle located in Ireland, one of the most admirable and delightful couple got married and still remains together, who are called Victoria and David Beckham. They have spent 18 years with each other. Today they have four beautiful kids with them and they still are an example of a successful long-term relationship. There have been many rumors concerning their relationship as some said that Beckham is going to buy the island named Victoria for his wife for commemorating his 20th anniversary. On the hand, all these rumors were rejected. However, ‚ÄúThe Filthy Rich Guide‚Äù show reported that Beckham has spent a lot of money on a Himalayan Herm√®s Birkin handbag, made of albino crocodile skin.</p> <h2>Jay Z and Beyonc√©</h2>      <p> no mercy ‚Ä¢ #beyonce #yonce #b #queenb #beyhive #beyhivesupportsbeyonce #slayonce #beyonc√© #beyoncegiselleknowlescarter #bey #jayonc√© #carter #beyoncestwins #jayz #444 #beyoncememe #blueivycarter #carterfam #blackandwhiteisworththefight #jayzbeyonce #cartertwins #beygood #beyoncealwaysonbeat #perfectbey #sashafierce #ivyparkbeyonce #flawless #livinglegend #rumiandsircarter</p> <p>A post shared by BEYHIVEüëëüêù (@beyonce_carter_fam) on Sep 16, 2017 at 1:52pm PDT</p>   <p></p> <p>Jay Z and Beyonc√© are together since a long time. They initially met each other somewhere around 1999 and 2000. Beyonc√© was eighteen at that time. Beyonc√© shared with Oprah how they have been together on phone with each other and how important it is to maintain that kind of relationship in order to know each other better and for an improved relationship. She also stressed on the importance of honesty and integrity for maintaining a good relationship. They worked together on various projects and hence strengthened the relationship further. They married each other in 2008 in a private wedding in New York City. They had their first child in 2012. The relationship did get weaker in between the years and there were rumors of divorce and separation. Some even reported to have spotted them fighting each other in elevator. However, despite all the misery, they recently commemorated nine years of successful marriage and at the same time they had twins in June in the form of a daughter and a son. They indeed are dedicated to each other.</p> <h2>Jennifer Anniston and Justin Theroux</h2>      <p> The couple whose¬†fingers are touchingüòç üìÖSeptember 26, 2011. (#JenniferAniston/#JustinTheroux/#Justifer/#Justifer2011)</p> <p>A post shared by Mr and Mrs Theroux‚ù§ (@justiferforever) on Sep 27, 2017 at 6:23pm PDT</p>   <p></p> <p>Jennifer Anniston and Justin Theroux is another wonderful couple who have been together and dedicated towards each other. They were married in the year 2015 and are often spotted with each other at some places. The actress is considered to very easy going as she keeps everything on point no matter how busy she gets with work or life in general. They are friendly and at the same time humorous with each other which keeps them together happily since a long time.</p> <h2>Jada Pinkett and Will Smith</h2>      <p> Se n√£o for pra ser assim, eu nem namoro‚Ä¶ #willsmith #jadapinkettsmith #otp #adorocinema üòÇüòÇüòÇ</p>     <p>A post shared by AdoroCinema (@adorocinema) on Sep 24, 2017 at 12:42pm PDT</p>   <p></p> <p>In cloisters castle in Maryland, Jada Pinkett and Will Smith got married in 1997. They recently celebrated their 20th wedding anniversary. Though they have been together for long but at the same time they have reported that, just like many people out there, they have also experienced many hurdles along the way which caused damage within their relationship. Smith said that it is necessary that couple indulges in effective communication and shares with each other how they feel for each other. It is necessary, as Smith said, that counselling bring a lot of advantages as the couple knows each other better and truth is known to both due to which the couple is out of all kinds of misunderstandings and continues to share the livable bond again. So, according to then it is necessary that husband and wife may know each other well and communicate with each other no matter what.</p> <h2>Ellen and Portia</h2>      <p> Dory and me #FindingDory</p> <p>A post shared by Portia de Rossi (@portiaderossi) on Jun 9, 2016 at 1:50pm PDT</p>   <p></p> <p>Ellen and Portia is another couple which is married to each other since 2008. Ellen is often very busy with her great show which is called The Ellen DeGeneres Show first graced our television screens in 2003. They have their own ways of carrying their selves but both of them are as dapper as before. There have been many rumors about the couple talking about their marriage and of having arguments more often. It was also said that Rossi does not feels good when Ellen frankly talks with other actresses. However, all these silly rumors were brought down by the couple as they still confess to be in love with each other like they were initially.</p> <h2>Hugh Jackman and Deborra-Lee Furness</h2>      <p> My love ‚Ä¶. and just a few thousand of our @glblctzn friends.</p> <p>A post shared by Hugh Jackman (@thehughjackman) on Sep 25, 2017 at 7:36am PDT</p>   <p></p> <p>Hugh Jackman and his wife, Deborra-Lee Furness is a couple which proves that love exists without any barrier of age. Jackman is profoundly in love with his wife as they celebrated 21 years of their marriage recently and he posted on Instagram in a very loving and charming manner than ever before. They met each other in 1995 while working for a drama series named as Corelli. They have two children currently named as Oster and Ava. They are always in love with each other and find their relationship stringer than ever with each passing year. Jackman is said to be very proud of her and happy for the fact that she exists in his life. Deborra-Lee Furness once invited him to a party for dinner and they got along confessing each other about how both of them had feelings for each other. Indeed, that day was a beginning of their long-term successful relationship.</p> <h2>Jessica Alba and Cash Warren</h2>      <p> Smooches üòö ü§ì‚ù§Ô∏è</p> <p>A post shared by Jessica Alba (@jessicaalba) on Sep 15, 2017 at 10:38pm PDT</p>   <p></p> <p>Jessica Alba is someone who is loved by everyone for sure! Cash Warren and Jessica are married since long and they currently have two children. Warren has been indulged in working with a lot of documentaries and some television series and he also has many been a successful producer for some films. Jessica on the other hand has worked as an actress in many films and continues her success journey as an actress, but indeed both of them look incredible with ecahother.</p> <h2>Maggie Gyllenhaal and Peter Sarsgaard</h2>      <p> Date night + @jamesblake</p> <p>A post shared by Maggie Gyllenhaal (@mgyllenhaal) on Jun 7, 2017 at 6:01pm PDT</p>   <p></p> <p>Maggie Gyllenhaal and Peter Sarsgaard have been a starry couple for long. They do not disclose their personal life details to many people out there. They arranged a beautiful wedding anniversary in Convento di Santa Maria di Costantinopoli, situated in Brindisi. It was a wonderful and lovely wedding for sure. They have been found in Ney York by many people as they are assisting her brother, Jake with his business. They keep on attending various functions and keep stocking with each other as often as they possibly can, which is beautiful in itself.</p> <h2>Colin and Livia Firth</h2>      <p> #kingsmenthegoldencircle another #greencarpetchallenge @ecoage wearing @sculptour_fashion in recycled plastic bottles accessoriezed with @chopard earrings #thejourneytosustainableluxury and @tomford cuffs (notice the theme of the golden circle? üòú) clutch by @kayudesign i wore #30wears and beyond like the old shoes from a family owned factory in Umbria #madeinitaly @cameramoda #GCFAItalia Hair and make up by @karenalder</p> <p>A post shared by Livia Firth (@livia_firth) on Sep 18, 2017 at 10:38am PDT</p>   <p></p> <p>A very attractive couple named as Colin and Livia Firth are celebrating their twenty years together this year. Firth is famous for his role as Mr. Darcy in the interesting series known as Pride and prejudice. They have been together since 1997. They currently live with their two sons. While working for a BBC television series called the Nostromo, they first met each other. Livia established a company which is known as Eco-Age and it assisted brands in searching for eco-friendly choices for a successful and long-lasting business. She produced four kinds of documentaries which gave a message to the audience by finding that how fast fashion can have a harmful impact on people. It was known as ‚ÄòThe True Cost‚Äô</p> <h2>Denzel Washington and Pauletta</h2>      <p> Lil angel and I</p> <p>A post shared by Denzel Washington (@denzelwashington1) on Dec 7, 2012 at 4:03pm PST</p>   <p></p> <p>A very famous and extremely versatile actor called Denzel Washington is popular for his great works in the field of acting and for winning various awards in this regard. Denzel and Pauletta, his wife, recently celebrated their 33 years of marriage and wonderful relationship. While sharing the secrets behind his wonderful relationship with his wife for this long, he said that every relationship requires hard work and not for some time or so but consistently. He advised the new couples to stick with each other through thick and thin, never to part ways.</p> <h2>Oprah Winfrey and Stedman Graham</h2>      <p> Graduation cake. Celebrating today in Providence. #Browngraduate. 2 more to go!</p> <p>A post shared by Oprah (@oprah) on May 28, 2017 at 4:07pm PDT</p>   <p></p>     <p>Oprah Winfrey has an awesome bond with boyfriend, Steadman Graham from 1986. The couple initially did not share the relationship they were sharing with the people and the media, however recently while giving interview to Vogue, they disclosed all the details. They have been inseparable since the past thirty years and continue to live with each other. They have not married each other but have been living happily together since long. Oprah and her boyfriend do not believe that it is necessary to get married for having a true lovable relationship. They love each other anyways and have chosen to live their lives by their own rules. Such an amazing couple they are!</p>   <i></i>

frontmatter.mitle: 15 Famous Couples You Didn‚Äôt Realize Are Still Together
frontmatter.description: These 14 famous couples who are still together will inspire you to make efforts for your loved ones and be there for them, always.
